briefdescription.para: Mutex for accessing the GPU objects vector from several threads.
External window, null if not in use (default.)

detaileddescription.para: Most recently applied window mode. It may not represent actual window state if window was resized by user or Graphics::SetScreenMode was explicitly called.

briefdescription.para: Secondary window mode to be applied on Graphics::ToggleFullscreen.
Force OpenGL 2 flag. Only used on OpenGL.
sRGB conversion on write flag for the main window.
Hardware shadow map depth compare support flag.
sRGB conversion on read support flag.
sRGB conversion on write support flag.
Largest scratch buffer request this frame.
Shadow map dummy color texture format.
Current custom clip plane in post-projection space.
Cache directory for Direct3D binary shaders.
Last used shader in shader variation query.
Last used shader name in shader variation query.
Destruct. Release the Direct3D11 device and close the window.
Set external window handle. Only effective before setting the initial screen mode.

detaileddescription.para: Set window title. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set window icon. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set window position. Sets initial position if window is not created yet. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set window position. Sets initial position if window is not created yet.

memberdef.argsstring: (int width, int height, const ScreenModeParams &params, bool maximize=false)
memberdef.name: SetScreenMode

detaileddescription.para: Set screen mode. Return true if successful. Don't use SetScreenMode if ToggleFullscreen is used directly or indirectly.
Set screen resolution only. Return true if successful. Don't use SetScreenMode if ToggleFullscreen is used directly or indirectly.
Set window modes to be rotated by ToggleFullscreen. Apply primary window settings immeditally. Window may be maximized if requested and possible. Return true if successful.

briefdescription.para: Set default window modes. Return true if successful.

memberdef.argsstring: (int width, int height, bool fullscreen, bool borderless, bool resizable, bool highDPI, bool vsync, bool tripleBuffer, int multiSample, int monitor, int refreshRate)
memberdef.name: SetMode

briefdescription.para: Set default window modes. Deprecated. Return true if successful.
Set screen resolution only. Deprecated. Return true if successful.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether the main window uses sRGB conversion on write. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether rendering output is dithered. Default true on OpenGL. No effect on Direct3D. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Set whether to flush the GPU command buffer to prevent multiple frames being queued and uneven frame timesteps. Default off, may decrease performance if enabled. Not currently implemented on OpenGL. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set forced use of OpenGL 2 even if OpenGL 3 is available. Must be called before setting the screen mode for the first time. Default false. No effect on Direct3D9 & 11.

detaileddescription.para: Set allowed screen orientations as a space-separated list of "LandscapeLeft", "LandscapeRight", "Portrait" and "PortraitUpsideDown". Affects currently only iOS platform. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Toggle between full screen and windowed mode. Return true if successful.
Take a screenshot. Return true if successful.
Begin frame rendering. Return true if device available and can render.
End frame rendering and swap buffers.

memberdef.name: Clear

briefdescription.para: Clear any or all of rendertarget, depth buffer and stencil buffer.
Resolve multisampled backbuffer to a texture rendertarget. The texture's size should match the viewport size.
Resolve a multisampled texture on itself.
Resolve a multisampled cube texture on itself.

briefdescription.para: Set shader constant from a variant. Supported variant types: bool, float, vector2, vector3, vector4, color.
Check whether a shader parameter group needs update. Does not actually check whether parameters exist in the shaders.
Check whether a shader parameter exists on the currently set shaders.
Check whether the current vertex or pixel shader uses a texture unit.

Clear remembered transform shader parameter sources.

briefdescription.para: Set default texture filtering mode. Called by Renderer before rendering.
Set default texture anisotropy level. Called by Renderer before rendering.
Reset all rendertargets, depth-stencil surface and viewport.
Set blending and alpha-to-coverage modes. Alpha-to-coverage is not supported on Direct3D9.

Precache shader variations from an XML file generated with BeginDumpShaders().

memberdef.name: OpenWindow

briefdescription.para: Adjust parameters according to the platform. Fill in missing paramters and resolve possible conflicts.
Called when screen mode is successfully changed by the backend.
Adjust the window for new resolution and fullscreen mode.
Create the Direct3D11 device and swap chain. Requires an open window. Can also be called again to recreate swap chain. Return true on success.
Update Direct3D11 swap chain state for a new mode and create views for the backbuffer & default depth buffer. Return true on success.
Notify all GPU resources so they can release themselves as needed. Used only on Direct3D9.
Notify all GPU resources so they can recreate themselves as needed. Used only on Direct3D9.
Set vertex buffer stream frequency. Used only on Direct3D9.
Reset stream frequencies. Used only on Direct3D9.
Create intermediate texture for multisampled backbuffer resolve. No-op if already exists.
Clean up all framebuffers. Called when destroying the context. Used only on OpenGL.
Create a framebuffer using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.
Delete a framebuffer using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.
Bind a framebuffer using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned index, unsigned target, unsigned object, bool isRenderBuffer)
memberdef.name: BindColorAttachment

briefdescription.para: Bind a framebuffer color attachment using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.
Bind a framebuffer depth attachment using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.
Bind a framebuffer stencil attachment using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.
Check FBO completeness using either extension or core functionality. Used only on OpenGL.
Set vertex attrib divisor. No-op if unsupported. Used only on OpenGL.
Release/clear GPU objects and optionally close the window. Used only on OpenGL.
Graphics subsystem. Manages the application window, rendering state and GPU resources.
